gen key (user) for each server
 ssh-keygen -f web_server_key
 ssh-keygen -f db_server_key
 ssh-keygen -f log_server_key

create key pair resources
 

modify 3 resources   
- key_name = aws_key_pair.aws_key.key_name

upload key to all servers -> Just upload key pair 


ubuntu@ip-10-0-2-229:~$ traceroute 8.8.8.8
